channel.title: KozScape V2 | Development
channel.description:
[center]Base: Project Insanity|KozScape V1 [hr] [/center]
[font=Trebuchet Ms][center][size=5][u][b] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/jacdq1.png[/img][/b][/u][/size]
[ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#about]About us[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#aim]Update Log[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#donation]Facts and Questions[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#applying]The Applying Layout[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Staff list[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#credit]Credit/Section 7[/iurl][/li][/ul]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] KozScape V1 was released on December 07, 2011. I was busy at the time mostly school and other things. So I released very early. But now I am back to finish KozScape because I believe it has potential. I will release this after the development is finished. Credits will be given to all of the programmers that join the team! We are trying to make the server as fun as possible with many features to make it enjoyable for the players that are sick of the same server. With the same home, the same teleports shops, and ect. This server gives new regulations for creativity in a private server, it will not just be smooth and redone, it will also have those perfect features that make you want to play longer.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=about]2.0 - About us[/b][/size] -------- Empty For now --------

item.title: KozScape V2 | Development
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

you believe it has potential that server you released was shit i could make a better server in 1hour then that you added portals copied a tutorial on barb agility moved home and added like 1 quest and that was about it

[size=2][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/size]
KozScape V1 was released on December 07, 2011. I was busy at the time mostly school and other things. So I released very early. But now I am back to finish KozScape because I believe it has potential. I will release this after the development is finished. Credits will be given to all of the programmers that join the team! We are trying to make the server as fun as possible with many features to make it enjoyable for the players that are sick of the same server. With the same home, the same teleports shops, and ect. This server gives new regulations for creativity in a private server, it will not just be smooth and redone, it will also have those perfect features that make you want to play longer.
